name: Garden of Reverie
description:
Garden of Reverie is a dyssynchronous multiplayer game so make sure to bring a friend and communicate!

(REQUIRES 2 PLAYERS)

Setup instructions:

Both players download the game

Then select either player 1 or 2. Make sure you select different players!

GGJ 2022 - Seattle Indies

Sara Asmussen - Programmer
